Submodules

sensorthings.engine module

class sensorthings.engine.SensorThingsBaseEngine(request, get_response_schemas)

Bases: ThingBaseEngine, LocationBaseEngine, HistoricalLocationBaseEngine, DatastreamBaseEngine, SensorBaseEngine, ObservedPropertyBaseEngine, FeatureOfInterestBaseEngine, ObservationBaseEngine

Abstract base engine class for handling CRUD operations and querying SensorThings components.

request

The HTTP request object used for communication.

Type:

SensorThingsHttpRequest

get_response_schemas

Mapping of component names to their corresponding response schemas.

Type:

Dict[str, Type[BaseGetResponse]]

build_next_link(query_params, length, count=None)

Builds the next link for pagination.

Parameters:

  • query_params (dict) – The current query parameters for pagination.

  • length (int) – The length of the current result set.

  • count (int, optional) – The total count of entities available.

Returns:

The constructed next link for pagination, or None if there are no more pages.

Return type:

Optional[str]

build_ref_link(component, entity_id)

Builds a reference link for an entity.

Parameters:

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type of the entity for which to build the reference link.

  • entity_id (id_type) – The ID of the entity.

Returns:

The constructed reference link.

Return type:

str

check_nested_path()

Check if there is a nested path in the request and return the ID of the nested entity.

Returns:

The ID of the nested entity or None if no nested path exists.

Return type:

Optional[str]

create_entities(component, entity_body)

Create multiple entities of a specific component type.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to create.

  • entity_body (BasePostBody) – The body containing the data for creating the entities.

Returns:

A list of IDs of the created entities.

Return type:

List[str]

create_entity(component, entity_body, response)

Create a new entity of a specific component type.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to create.

  • entity_body (BasePostBody) – The body containing the data for creating the entity.

  • response (HttpResponse) – The HTTP response object to populate with the location of the created entity.

delete_entity(component, entity_id)

Delete an entity of a specific component type.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to delete.

  • entity_id (id_type) – The ID of the entity to delete.

fetch_entities(component, query_params=None, back_ref_ids=None)

Fetch entities of a specific component type with optional query parameters.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to fetch.

  • query_params (Optional[dict], optional) – Optional query parameters for filtering, pagination, etc.

  • back_ref_ids (Optional[dict], optional) – Optional back reference IDs for fetching related entities.

Returns:

A tuple containing a dictionary of fetched entities and the total count of entities.

Return type:

Tuple[Dict[str, dict], int]

get_entity(component, entity_id, query_params)

Retrieve a single entity of a specific component type by its ID.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to retrieve.

  • entity_id (id_type) – The ID of the entity to retrieve.

  • query_params (dict) – Optional query parameters for filtering, pagination, etc.

Returns:

The retrieved entity.

Return type:

Dict

static insert_entity_field(entities, entity_field_name, entity_function)

Inserts a field into each entity based on a provided function.

Parameters:

  • entities (dict) – A dictionary of entities.

  • entity_field_name (str) – The name of the field to insert.

  • entity_function (Callable) – A function to generate the field value.

Returns:

A dictionary of entities with the new field inserted.

Return type:

dict

insert_related_entities(entities, component, query_params, include_links=True)

Inserts related entities into the entities based on the expand query parameter.

Parameters:

  • entities (dict) – A dictionary of entities.

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type of the entities.

  • query_params (dict) – The query parameters containing expand information.

  • include_links (bool, optional) – Whether to include links to related entities (default is True).

Returns:

A dictionary of entities with related entities inserted.

Return type:

dict

insert_self_links(entities, component)

Inserts self-links into the entities.

Parameters:

  • entities (dict) – A dictionary of entities.

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type of the entities.

Returns:

A dictionary of entities with self-links inserted.

Return type:

dict

static iso_time_interval(start_time, end_time)

Formats a time interval in ISO 8601 format.

Parameters:

  • start_time (datetime, optional) – The start time of the interval.

  • end_time (datetime, optional) – The end time of the interval.

Returns:

The formatted ISO 8601 time interval string, or None if both times are None.

Return type:

Optional[str]

list_entities(component, query_params=None)

Retrieve a list of entities of a specific component type.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to retrieve.

  • query_params (Optional[dict], optional) – Optional query parameters for filtering, pagination, etc.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the retrieved entities and optional metadata.

Return type:

Dict

static parse_expand(component, query_params)

Parses the expand query parameter for related entities and their nested properties.

Parameters:

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type for which to parse expand parameters.

  • query_params (dict) – The query parameters containing the expand parameter.

Returns:

A dictionary mapping related component names to their respective query parameters.

Return type:

dict

static parse_filters(query_params)

Parses the filters query parameter into a filter object.

Parameters:

query_params (dict) – The query parameters containing the filters.

Returns:

The parsed filter object, or None if no filters are specified.

Return type:

object

static parse_ordering(query_params)

Parses ordering parameters from query parameters.

Parameters:

query_params (dict) – The query parameters containing ordering information.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries specifying field names and directions for ordering.

Return type:

list of dict

static parse_pagination(query_params)

Parses pagination parameters from query parameters.

Parameters:

query_params (dict) – The query parameters containing pagination information.

Returns:

Return type:

dict

parse_select(component, query_params)

Parses the select query parameter to determine unselected fields.

Parameters:

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type for which to parse the select parameter.

  • query_params (dict) – The query parameters containing the select parameter.

Returns:

A list of unselected field names.

Return type:

list

remove_unselected_fields(entities, component, query_params)

Removes fields from entities that are not selected in query parameters.

Parameters:

  • entities (dict) – A dictionary of entities with their fields.

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type to process.

  • query_params (dict) – The query parameters specifying the selected fields.

Returns:

A dictionary of entities with only the selected fields.

Return type:

dict

update_entity(component, entity_id, entity_body)

Update an existing entity of a specific component type.

Parameters:

  • component (Type[BaseComponent]) – The type of component to update.

  • entity_id (id_type) – The ID of the entity to update.

  • entity_body (BasePatchBody) – The body containing the data for updating the entity.

update_related_components(component, related_entity_id)

Updates the related components of an entity.

Parameters:

  • component (Type['BaseComponent']) – The component type of the related entity.

  • related_entity_id (id_type) – The ID of the related entity.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.http module

class sensorthings.http.SensorThingsHttpRequest

Bases: HttpRequest

Custom HTTP request class for SensorThings API.

This class extends the standard Django HttpRequest to include additional attributes specific to SensorThings API requests.

sensorthings_url

The SensorThings URL string.

Type:

AnyHttpUrlString

sensorthings_path

The SensorThings path.

Type:

str

engine

The engine instance for SensorThings.

Type:

SensorThingsBaseEngine

nested_path

The nested path as a list of tuples, each containing a BaseComponent and an optional ID.

Type:

List[Tuple[BaseComponent, Optional[ST_API_ID_TYPE]]]

ref_response

Indicates whether the response is a reference.

Type:

bool

value_response

Indicates whether the response is a value.

Type:

bool

engine: SensorThingsBaseEngine
nested_path: List[Tuple[BaseComponent, Optional[int]]]
ref_response: bool
sensorthings_path: str
sensorthings_url: Url
value_response: bool

sensorthings.main module

class sensorthings.main.SensorThingsAPI(engine=None, endpoints=None, **kwargs)

Bases: NinjaAPI

Custom API class for SensorThings, extending NinjaAPI.

This class initializes the API, sets up routing, and integrates with SensorThings components and endpoints.

class sensorthings.main.SensorThingsEndpoint(**data)

Bases: BaseModel

Data model for defining a SensorThings API endpoint.

name

The name of the endpoint.

Type:

str

deprecated

Whether the endpoint is deprecated. Default is False.

Type:

bool, optional

authentication

Authentication callbacks. Default is None.

Type:

Optional[Union[Sequence[Callable], Callable]], optional

authorization

Authorization callbacks. Default is None.

Type:

Optional[Union[Sequence[Callable], Callable]], optional

body_schema

The schema for the request body. Default is None.

Type:

Optional[Type], optional

response_schema

The schema for the response. Default is None.

Type:

Union[List[Type], Type, None], optional

authentication: Union[Sequence[Callable], Callable, None]
authorization: Union[Sequence[Callable], Callable, None]
body_schema: Optional[Type]
deprecated: bool
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}
model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'authentication': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[Sequence[Callable], Callable, NoneType], required=False), 'authorization': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[Sequence[Callable], Callable, NoneType], required=False), 'body_schema': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[Type, NoneType], required=False), 'deprecated': FieldInfo(annotation=bool, required=False, default=False), 'name': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=True), 'response_schema': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[List[Type], Type, NoneType], required=False)}
name: str
response_schema: Union[List[Type], Type, None]

sensorthings.middleware module

class sensorthings.middleware.SensorThingsMiddleware(get_response=None)

Bases: MiddlewareMixin

Middleware for processing SensorThings API views.

This middleware attaches the SensorThings engine to the request and handles advanced paths.

static get_component_model_from_path(path_component)

Get the component model from the path component.

Parameters:

path_component (str) – The path component.

Returns:

The component model class.

Return type:

Type

static get_placeholder_id()

Get a placeholder ID based on the ID type.

Returns:

A placeholder ID.

Return type:

Union[str, int, UUID]

process_view(request, view_func, view_args, view_kwargs)

Process the view before it is called.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The current HTTP request.

  • view_func (Callable) – The view function that will be called.

  • view_args (tuple) – The positional arguments for the view function.

  • view_kwargs (dict) – The keyword arguments for the view function.

sensorthings.renderer module

class sensorthings.renderer.SensorThingsRenderer

Bases: JSONRenderer

A custom JSON renderer for the SensorThings API.

This renderer checks if the request object has a pre-defined ‘response_string’ attribute. If so, it uses this string as the response. Otherwise, it defaults to the standard JSON rendering.

render(request, data, *, response_status)

Render the response for the given request and data.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • data (Any) – The data to render.

  • response_status (int) – The HTTP response status.

Returns:

The rendered response string, either from ‘response_string’ attribute or standard JSON rendering.

Return type:

str

sensorthings.router module

class sensorthings.router.SensorThingsRouter(*, auth=ninja.constants.NOT_SET_TYPE, tags=None)

Bases: Router

A custom router for the SensorThings API that extends Django Ninja’s Router. It provides methods for common HTTP operations with standardized response schemas.

class sensorthings.SensorThingsAPI(engine=None, endpoints=None, **kwargs)

Bases: NinjaAPI

Custom API class for SensorThings, extending NinjaAPI.

This class initializes the API, sets up routing, and integrates with SensorThings components and endpoints.

class sensorthings.SensorThingsHttpRequest

Bases: HttpRequest

Custom HTTP request class for SensorThings API.

This class extends the standard Django HttpRequest to include additional attributes specific to SensorThings API requests.

sensorthings_url

The SensorThings URL string.

Type:

AnyHttpUrlString

sensorthings_path

The SensorThings path.

Type:

str

engine

The engine instance for SensorThings.

Type:

SensorThingsBaseEngine

nested_path

The nested path as a list of tuples, each containing a BaseComponent and an optional ID.

Type:

List[Tuple[BaseComponent, Optional[ST_API_ID_TYPE]]]

ref_response

Indicates whether the response is a reference.

Type:

bool

value_response

Indicates whether the response is a value.

Type:

bool

engine: SensorThingsBaseEngine
nested_path: List[Tuple[BaseComponent, Optional[int]]]
